deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: @dev receives XDC from users and deposit in Ankr's staking. Hence, users will still earn reward from changing aXDCc ratio
@dev Total CollateralTokens that has been staked in WAD
@dev Mapping of user(positionAddress) => recordRatioNCerts that he has ownership over.
@dev Mapping of user(positionAddress) => collteralTokens that he is staking
@dev Ignore collateralTokens that have been directly transferred
@dev Return Net Assets per Share in wad
@dev Move wad amount of staked balance from source to destination. Can only be moved if underlaying assets make sense.

devdoc.details: receives XDC from users and deposit in Ankr's staking. Hence, users will still earn reward from changing aXDCc ratio

params._amount: The XDC amount that being used as a collateral and to be staked to AnkrStakingPool
params._data: The extra data that may needs to execute the deposit
params._positionAddress: The address that holding states of the position

netAssetPerShare().details: Return Net Assets per Share in wad

netAssetValuation().details: Ignore collateralTokens that have been directly transferred

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params._amount: The XDC col amount(translated to aXDCc) to be withdrawn from AnkrCollateralAdapter and return to user
params._usr: The address that holding states of the position

recordRatioNCerts.details: Mapping of user(positionAddress) => recordRatioNCerts that he has ownership over.

stake.details: Mapping of user(positionAddress) => collteralTokens that he is staking

totalShare.details: Total CollateralTokens that has been staked in WAD
